arts.sum: The game was only three minutes old when Ipswich were handed an opportunity to score from the penalty spot after a foul in the area. Matt Bloxham’s side still looked like the likelier team to score but couldn’t find an opening in the Ipswich defence.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City draw at Sheffield Wednesday as Omer Riza's audition continues
arts.sum: The Bluebirds went in front put were soon pegged back to come away with a point

arts.ttl: Di’Shon Bernard nets equaliser as Sheffield Wednesday draw with Cardiff
arts.sum: Ollie Tanner fired the Bluebirds ahead on 34 minutes as they sought a first win in three matches.

Tanner, who scored from close range in the first half, tried his luck from distance after 78 minutes. Wednesday substitution Anthony Musaba hit one from outside the box with three minutes of the 90 left.
International football is consigned to the memory bank for 2024 and there is a full slate of Championship action this weekend as Phil Agius previews all 12 games.

arts.sum: Ruben Amorim will become the 10th manager to take charge of a Manchester United game in the last 11 years this weekend when the Red Devils face Ipswich in their Premier League clash.
